parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game5</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version5</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets scale of a control. Top left corner remains same. This command requires [[ctrlCommit]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control '''ctrlSetScale''' scale

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> scale: [[Number]] - Scale e.g. 2 = 200% in size

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetScale]] 0.5;<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Makes the control 50% smaller</value></part></template>
_control [[ctrlCommit]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlScale]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]]
</value></part></template></root>
